title: DevOps Trainee
description: Undergoing structured training in DevOps, cloud computing, and Linux administration.
responsibilities: Designing and implementing CI/CD pipelines with Jenkins and GitHub Actions
Managing Kubernetes clusters for container orchestration

title: DevOps Intern
description: Working on cloud automation, CI/CD pipelines, and infrastructure provisioning.
responsibilities: Building and maintaining CI/CD pipelines for automated deployments
Integrating APIs for cloud service automation

title: System Administrator
description: Working on cloud automation, CI/CD pipelines, and infrastructure provisioning.
responsibilities: Implementing infrastructure as code using Terraform and Ansible
Setting up monitoring and alerting systems for infrastructure health
Collaborating with development teams to streamline deployment processes
